description: Christ at center in red robes wearing crown of thorns; figure kneeling in LRC wearing blue binds Christ's wrists with rope; soldier behind Christ with unidentified tool; another figure at right wearing brown; three figures in shadows, ULC; dark image
markings: on back of stretcher: two Santa Barbara Museum of Art loan labels; on back of canvas, on label: [THE CROWING WITH THORNS. / CARLO DOLCI. / 1616/1686. / Sold by order of Earl of Jersey, / Middleton Park, / Bicester, Oxon. June 5th.1934. / Lot 201F]
title: Crown of Thorns
